title: Update site logo asset and add Twitter/X social link

requirements.summary: Replace the current site logo with the new generated logo asset across header and footer.
acceptanceCriteria: Header logo no longer uses /assets/generated/logo-email-copywriter.dim_512x256.png and instead uses the new generated logo asset.
Footer logo no longer uses /assets/generated/logo-email-copywriter.dim_512x256.png and instead uses the new generated logo asset.
The logo renders crisply at the existing displayed size (h-8) without layout shift in header/footer.

file_operations.description: Add the new generated logo asset (cropped/resized from the uploaded 20250307_184458.jpg) as a static file to be used site-wide.
Update the header logo src to use /assets/generated/logo-quillworks.dim_512x256.png while keeping the existing sizing classes (h-8 w-auto) to avoid layout shift.
Update the footer logo src to use /assets/generated/logo-quillworks.dim_512x256.png while keeping the existing sizing classes (h-8 w-auto) to avoid layout shift.

requirements.summary: Add a visible Twitter/X link to https://x.com/QuillworksMedia that opens in a new tab with proper rel attributes and accessible labeling.
acceptanceCriteria: A Twitter/X link is present on the marketing site UI and navigates to https://x.com/QuillworksMedia.
The link opens in a new tab and uses rel="noopener noreferrer".
The link has accessible text/aria-label indicating it is the Twitter/X profile link.

file_operations.description: Add a visible Twitter/X social link pointing to https://x.com/QuillworksMedia in the footer, using target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer", and include accessible text and/or aria-label indicating it is the Twitter/X profile link.
